amendment.description: To provide that attorney-client privileged information shall retain the same protections that would apply in private civil litigation if private counsel is retained to pursue an enforcement action authorized under this Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4116 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
